PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Indeed , DPP - based conjugated polymers have achieved impressive PCEs up to 9% by the combination of DPP and various electron - donating building blocks.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| DPP (Dpp-based polymers) |
| PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) |
| 9% (Maximum achieved PCE)
| Combination |
| DPP and various electron - donating building blocks |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| DPP (Dpp-based polymers) |
| Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) |
| 9% (Maximum achieved PCE) |
| Combination of DPP and various electron-donating building blocks |

Note: "Combination" can be considered a process or event, but in this context, it refers to the mixture or blending of DPP and various electron-donating building blocks as materials, so it is included as a property.
